meta.notes: Total includes patients from other states and a new category "Foreign Evacuees" which is now reported in AP bulletin.

Includes one case from Nagaland.
Total of 3 patients who migrated to other states has been reduced from Active count

Delhi bulletins in the morning, containing data of the previous day. We will add that data to the date on which the report is released, rather than the previous day.
[June 16]: 344 deceased cases have been retroactively added to DL bulletin.
Death of Tibetan refugee on March 22 included in Kangra district's tally
HP has 12 Migrated cases which are reduced from Active #. Also, death of Tibetan refugee is included in deceased numbers, but not in confirmed
4 cases are classified as non-covid related deaths in KA bulletin. They have been reduced from active cases
Mahe native who expired in Kannur included in Kerala's tally

13 cases were marked as non-covid deaths in MH bulletin. These have been reduced from deceased and active counts
[June 16] : 1328 deceased cases have been retroactively added to MH bulletin.
Includes NDRF-ODRF returnees after West Bengal Amphan duty
Three non-covid deaths reported in state dashboard are included in the deceased count

2 deaths cross notified to other states from Chennai and Coimbatore.
1 patient died after turning negative for infection in Chengalpattu.
These cases have been added to TN deceased tally
MoHFW website reports that these are the 'cases that are being reassigned to states'. 589 cases were increased from this category today by MoHFW. We have reduced this cases from total for the day.
13 Migrated cases reduced from Active count
